Package limitedlibrarymanagementsystem

Class BookData

java.lang.Object
limitedlibrarymanagementsystem.BookData
public class BookData extends Object
Contains Data for Book objects Design Pattern -> Strategy (composition) Final Project for Programming Patterns course - Fall 2021.
